backend/main.mo: Defines the main Ribbit canister with storage, access control, user profiles, ponds, posts, ribbits, likes, activity tracking, and tag stats data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report describing a frontend layout update to LilyPage and its associated files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for various frontend files, describing their roles in routing, layout, UI components, and pages.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx, setting metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app’s TanStack Router routes and wraps the application in ThemeProvider and RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Renders a bookmark toggle button for a lily using local bookmark state with click handling.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a comment display component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty file placeholder for emoji reaction UI.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution to caffeine.ai, styled with border and muted text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search, navigation, user avatar, dropdowns, and mobile search modal handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping all pages with Header, Footer, and mobile sidebar drawer, auto-closing on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation component showing links and recent activity, with active-route highlighting and mobile drawer support.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post card with pond/user info, image handling, like/share actions, and metadata counts.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer component that shows the left sidebar with scroll lock and animated overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderator info, and join/leave controls.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile pond header with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a post card component.
Empty file placeholder for an emoji tray component.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit reply with avatar, timestamp, like button, and reply form.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with input handling and selection callbacks.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown panel for desktop search showing trending searches or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar displaying top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrapper components around TabsList and TabsTrigger to create underline-style tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper methods for modifying the list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query matches and updates on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, profiles, searches, and related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes plus utility classes for UI behavior and styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notations like k, M, and B with simple rounding.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides alphanumeric validation, normalization, and error messaging for pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using the Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks plus toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Handles alphanumeric validation, normalization, and optional error messaging for tags.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, Froggy Phrase authentication, and settings backup via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static page explaining Ribbit, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with join status, loading states, and navigation to individual pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new lily with text, image, or link, including pond selection, tag suggestions, validation, and image preview handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with name and phrase validation, description input, and banner/profile image upload and preview.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search handling, and sidebars, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with comments, like/view counts, image lightbox, and logic for cooldown-based view count increments.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond information including moderators, visibility, creation date, membership status, and leave-pond functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Pond feed page that loads pond data, lilies, membership state, and renders join actions, tabs, and sidebars with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Displays locally bookmarked lilies, loading states, and removal actions using LilyCard components.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Tag discovery hub showing top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with canonical-tag redirect logic and sort controls.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: User settings panel handling username changes, avatar uploads, profile editing, pond membership, admin tools, and Froggy Phrase backup/restore.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking state, known issues, and a pending feature request about aligning LilyPage layout.
